'speaker_6': 'So just to provide some background information on healthy food for Denver's kids. It was created as a result of a citizen led ballot measure that was approved by Denver voters in 2018. It resulted in a small increase in the sales and use tax about a penny on a $10 purchase.'

'speaker_6': 'That's created a special revenue fund for healthy food access and food based education for Denver's youth. Funds are being distributed through competitive grant making to nonprofits, city agencies and schools in Denver aimed primarily at serving low income and at risk youth.'

'speaker_6': 'After almost a year of grant making activity completed, the Healthy Food for Denver's Kids Commission and staff have developed some proposed language changes to our ordinance. 'speaker_6': 'way across the community. So a summary of these proposed changes include changing under 18 to 18 and under. That is to be more aligned with standard age cutoffs and include high school students of all ages. 'speaker_6': 'or providing education as only a small part of their work to be able to apply for our funds. We would like to clarify that distributed grant funds, rather than organizations overall need to principally benefit Denver residents, since it is a taxpayer fund.'

'speaker_6': 'We would like to clarify that public schools in Denver can apply in addition to DPS as an entity. So that would also include individual schools and charters in the district. We would like to change the requirement that Commissioners be a resident of Denver to live or work in Denver.'

'speaker_6': 'To recognize there are many folks that are highly invested in our community but may not be able to live here. We can still express a preference for Denver residents through our application materials. 'speaker_6': 'on the Commission. So we expect that these proposed changes, if passed, will allow more organizations across the city to be eligible for our funds impacting nonprofits and schools and neighborhoods across the city because the grant program may become more competitive.'

'speaker_6': 'We hope to be able to invest in the most impactful projects. We also anticipate greater equity and inclusion and diversity among our members in terms of age and residency.
